Bangladesh.description: A flavorful and aromatic rice dish cooked with spices, meat, and sometimes eggs or vegetables.
Bangladesh.recipe: Cook rice and meat separately. Layer rice and meat, then cook with biryani masala.

Bangladesh.description: Hilsa fish marinated with mustard paste and spices, wrapped in banana leaves, and baked to perfection.
Bangladesh.recipe: Marinate fish with mustard paste, turmeric, chili, and bake in banana leaves.

Bangladesh.description: Crispy and hollow puris filled with spicy and tangy tamarind water, chickpeas, potatoes, and various spices.
Bangladesh.recipe: Make crispy puris, fill with mashed potatoes, chickpeas, spices, and tamarind water.

Bangladesh.description: Creamy coconut milk-based curry with prawns, flavored with spices, green chilies, and fresh coriander.
Bangladesh.recipe: Cook prawns in coconut milk with spices, green chilies, and garnish with fresh coriander.

India.description: Tender chicken pieces cooked in a creamy tomato-based sauce, flavored with Indian spices.
India.recipe: Marinate chicken, grill, and simmer in a sauce made with butter, tomatoes, cream, and spices.

India.description: Thin, crispy pancake made from fermented rice and urad dal (black gram) batter, served with chutney and sambar.
India.recipe: Ferment rice and urad dal, spread thin batter on a hot griddle, cook until crispy. Serve with chutney and sambar.

India.description: Aromatic lamb curry cooked with a blend of Kashmiri spices, yogurt, and tomatoes.
India.recipe: Saut√© onions, add lamb, spices, yogurt, and tomatoes. Slow-cook until the lamb is tender.

India.description: Marinated and grilled cubes of paneer (Indian cottage cheese) served with mint chutney.
India.recipe: Marinate paneer in a blend of yogurt, spices, and herbs. Grill until charred and serve hot.

Japan.description: A dish of vinegared rice accompanied by various ingredients such as raw or cooked seafood, vegetables, and occasionally tropical fruits.
Japan.recipe: Place seasoned rice on nori, add fish or vegetables, roll tightly, and cut into bite-sized pieces.

Japan.description: Japanese noodle soup dish with Chinese-style wheat noodles served in a meat or fish-based broth, often flavored with soy sauce or miso.
Japan.recipe: Boil noodles, prepare broth with miso/soy sauce, add toppings like sliced pork, green onions, and a boiled egg.

Japan.description: Lightly battered and deep-fried seafood, vegetables, and mushrooms, served with a dipping sauce.
Japan.recipe: Coat seafood/vegetables with tempura batter, deep fry until golden brown. Serve with dipping sauce.

Japan.description: Octopus-filled savory balls made of batter, cooked in a special molded pan, and served with takoyaki sauce and bonito flakes.
Japan.recipe: Pour batter into takoyaki pan, add diced octopus, cook until golden brown. Top with takoyaki sauce and bonito flakes.

Thailand.description: Stir-fried rice noodles with tofu or shrimp, bean sprouts, peanuts, egg, and lime, flavored with tamarind sauce.
Thailand.recipe: Stir-fry soaked rice noodles with tofu/shrimp, bean sprouts, egg, and tamarind sauce. Garnish with peanuts and lime.

Thailand.description: Thai curry made with green chili paste, coconut milk, vegetables, and choice of meat, served with rice.
Thailand.recipe: Cook green chili paste with coconut milk, add vegetables and meat. Serve hot with rice.

Thailand.description: Spicy and sour shrimp soup flavored with lemongrass, kaffir lime leaves, chili, and lime juice.
Thailand.recipe: Boil shrimp with lemongrass, lime leaves, chili, and season with fish sauce and lime juice.

Thailand.description: Spicy green papaya salad made with shredded green papaya, tomatoes, green beans, peanuts, and chili.
Thailand.recipe: Pound papaya, tomatoes, green beans, and chili in a mortar. Add lime juice, fish sauce, and peanuts. Mix well.
